player.orbit_control: whether or not we have orbit control true/false
player.model_src: path to model -- paths HAVE TO include folder in which the project is located -- if empty, qualities will be used
player.__comment_on_qualities: qualities should be in order: best -> worst

qualities.file_size: telling the size of file -- optional
qualities.short_comment: eg not suitable for mobile phones -- may be left blank

player.model_rotation: -90, 0, 0 --- specifies model rotation (if it is upside down for example)

annotations.id: uniqueID1 -- when it contains number the annotation will be numbered

galleries.json_gallery_src: path from player to source of gallery description JSON file
galleries.parent_id: uniqueID1 -- ID of a parent element -- will be appended to it
galleries.has_full_size_version: true/false -- if true, the full version of image will be opened in new window after clicking
